comments.body: Sorry to be obtuse, but I'm not sure what this is for.  Could you maybe add a sample usage in the test file?

The test file has a usage at https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/8ec0ab5eb0283bb7ef715ec3b4b68f11e1f93cd0/types/locale/locale-tests.ts#L44 - See https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/express-serve-static-core/index.d.ts#L19 for info. Most declarations (there's > 30) that use this augmentation don't have anything to describe what this global augmentation does, but `passport` does have the line `// These declarations are merged into express's Request type`
